/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. In the distance, mountains rise against the sky, providing a stunning backdrop to the city's hustle and bustle.
